text:
Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra's wedding celebrations are not just about two people in love finding their happily ever after. Rather, the celebrations have involved both the families in a way that it is more like a holiday for them.
Agencies
After Mehendi and Sangeet yesterday, the families were hooked in a cricket match, where the two teams were divided into ladkiwale and Ladkewale. The teams were called P and N.
Agencies
Apart from the cricket match, the couple has solemnised their love affair by exchanging vows according to Christian tradition. Reports claim that Priyanka Chopra looked like a dream in her Christian bride attire. She donned Ralph Lauren's customized wedding gown. Nick Jonas looked handsome in a purple tuxedo by the same label. The couple exchanged wedding bands by the star jeweler Chopard as Nick's father, Paul Kevin Jonas Sr. officiated the wedding.
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 186 SHARES 161 SHARES 1.1 K SHARES
Nick and Priyanka will be getting married in both Christain and Hindu wedding ceremonies
PTI
According to a DNA report, a small gathering of 250 guests will assemble at the Darbar Hall in Umaid Bhawan for a party post the Christian wedding.
title: It's Official! Priyanka Chopra-Nick Jonas Get Hitched In A Traditional Christian Ceremony!
